```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)

mlb <- read_csv("mlb_elo.csv")

```

```{r}
win_loss<-mlb%>%
  filter(season >= 1995)%>%
  gather(team1, team2, key = home, value = team)%>% 
  filter(season == 2019, team == "ANA")%>%
  
```
